formatted_address: Level 39, Marina Bay Financial Centre, 10 Marina Blvd, Tower 2, Singapore 018983
name: Servcorp - Marina Bay Financial Centre

reviews.text: Our company has been with ServCorp for more than 6 months and thanks to the supportive staff and conducive environment to start our businesses. Location is great, excellent views of Marina,  diverse community and friendly ServCorp team to interact with. Very ideal for new company start-ups and foreign companies to launch in Singapore.

Old aged place with menacing protocols and charges around helping you to open office door if you ever forgot keys and around space bookings as well as printings etc. All out to bite your head off with exorbitant rates and penalizing T&Cs. Always out of cups in pantry and no proper meeting systems, no conference phones in their meeting rooms, no proper display. Take your money and go elsewhere, plenty of options in the hood.

Outstanding service and facilities! The team is super helpful and efficient. Their prompt assistance has made a significant difference in my productivity. The space itself is immaculate - always clean and tidy, making it a pleasure to work here.

Warm and welcoming receptionists along with a great view of the Marina Bay area.

Would reccomend to anyone looking for a co-working space in the CBD area.
Vague and blurry T&C. The worse part is the manager lady wasn't able to explain clearly. Or they donâ€™t mean to follow their own terms because they had no clue either. Be mindful.

vicinity: Level 39, Marina Bay Financial Centre, 10 Marina Boulevard, Tower 2
